title: Blog|记录 GitHub & Hexo 博客搭建过程
content:
Instroduction ——简介

Welcome! Today I’m going to share my experience of set up my own blog. Above all, you should get Hexo and a GitHub account prepared.
欢迎！ 今天我将会分享我搭建个人博客的经历。首先，你需要准备好Hexo和一个GitHub账号。

Equipment ——准备工作

Notes ——注意事项

  • Make sure that your input method is English
  • Replace “Username” and “Email” mentioned with your own “Username” and “Email” of your GitHub
  • Operate by Git Bash
  • 确保使用英文输入法
  • 将提及的”用户名“和”邮箱“替换为自己的GitHub账户名和邮箱
  • 使用 Git Bash 操作

Environment Setup ——环境搭建

At first, we need to set up a local operating environment. Hexo is based on Node.js, and during the process we also need to use npm which is installed while installing Node.js and Git. As a result, we should install Node.js and Git.

首先，我们需要搭建一个本地操作环境。Hexo基于Node.js，过程中我们还需要使用npm（Node.js 自带）和Git，因此我们需要安装 Node.js 和 Git。

The web address is as follows:

网站地址如下：

  • Hexo
  • Node.js
  • Git

Download Node.js and Git, install all of them, click “Next” always. After you finished, you can use the following command in turn to confirm whether you have installed them correctly and lean the version you installed:

下载Node.js 和 Git，安装，一路点击“下一步”。 安装完后依次输入以下指令以确认是否正确安装以及获悉安装的版本:

node -v
npm -v
git --version

Connect GitHub ——连接GitHub

Sign up an account ——创建账户

Sign up an account on GitHub with your Email. Choose ‘Free account’ and finish Email verification. Input following commands:

git config --global user.name "GitHub Username"
git config --global user.email "GitHub Email"

用你的邮箱在GitHub上创建账户。选择免费帐户并完成邮箱验证。输入以下指令：

git config --global user.name "GitHub 用户名"
git config --global user.email "GitHub 邮箱"

Create an SSH key ——创建SSH密钥

Input ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "GitHub Email" and keep pressing “Enter” .

输入 ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "GitHub 邮箱" 一路按”回车”键。

Add a key ——添加密钥

Enter the path [C:\Users\username.ssh], check and show “hidden items”. Now, open the id_rsa.pub with your Notepad and copy the content in it.

Log in your GitHub and enter the page ‘Setttings’. Select ‘SSH and GPG keys’ on the left column. Click “New SSH key”. Give ‘Title’ a name and paste what you copy in id_rsa.pub into the Key. Finally, click ‘Add SSH key’ to complete the addition.

进入路径[C:\Users\用户名.ssh]，确保勾选显示“隐藏的项目”，用记事本打开id_rsa.pub并复制里面的内容。

登录GitHub并进入“Settings”页面。在左边栏选择“SSH and GPG keys”选项。点击“New SSH key”。给“Title” 起一个名字，然后将刚才在id_rsa.pub中复制的内容粘贴到Key。最后点击“Add SSH key”完成添加。

Authenticate connections ——验证连接

Open Git Bash, input ssh -T git@github.com , and input ‘yes’ to confirm.

When it appears “Hi xxx! You’ve successfully…”, congratrulations, you’ve done this process.

打开Git Bash，输入 ssh -T git@github.com ，并输入yes来确认。当出现 “Hi xxx! You’ve successfully…”，恭喜你连接成功。

Create a Github Pages repository ——创建 GitHub Pages 仓库

The ’+‘ on the top right of your home page -> New repository:

  • input username.github.io in Repository name
  • Check the box ‘Add a README file’
  • Whether fill in the Description depends on you

GitHub 主页右上角“+” -> New repository:

  • 在Repository name中输入 用户名.github.io
  • 勾选 “Add a README file”
  • 选填Description

Click ‘Create repository’ to create.

点击”Create repository“来创建。

When you complete the processes above, you’ll obtain an address for your bolg: https://username.github.io

当你完成了上述步骤，你将获得一个博客地址：https://用户名.github.io

Install Hexo Program ——安装Hexo程序

Install Hexo ——安装Hexo

Create a new floder to save your Hexo program. Right click it and launch your Git Bash. Input the following command to install Hexo:

创建一个新的文件夹来存放你的Hexo程序，右键文件夹并启动Git Bash，使用如下命令来安装Hexo：

npm install -g hexo-cli

It may take a long time please wait patiently until you see the feedback like this.

安装时间可能会很久，请耐心等待直到出现如下界面。

Initialize and local preview ——初始化和本地预览

Initialize and install the necessary components:

初始化和安装必要插件：

hexo init # 初始化
npm install # 安装插件

After you completing the process above, input the following command to preview.

完成上述步骤以后，输入如下命令进行预览：

hexo g # 生成页面
hexo s # 启动预览

Access to http://localhost:4000 , you’ll see the default interface of Hexo which means you’ve correctly installed the local blog.

访问 http://localhost:4000， 看到Hexo的默认界面，这便意味着你的本地博客安装成功了！

Deploy Hexo to GitHub Pages ——部署 Hexo 到 GitHub Pages

After you successfully testing the local blog, you can upload your local blog to GitHub to deploy. This will make your blog can be visited on the Internet.

当完成测试本地博客后，就可以上传到GitHub进行部署，让你的博客在网络上可以被访问。

At First, you should install hexo-deployer-git:

首先需要安装 hexo-deployer-git:

npm install hexo-deployer-git --save

Next, edit the ‘Deployment’ part at the end of ‘_congfig.yml’ like this:

deploy:
  type: git
  repository: git@github.com:username/username.github.io.git
  branch: main

然后修改 _config.yml 文件末尾的Deployment 部分。修改如下： 

deploy:
  type: git
  repository: git@github.com:用户名/用户名.github.io.git
  branch: main

Finally, launch hexo d to upload your blog to GitHub Pages.

Finish! Now you visit your GitHub domain name https://username.github.io ,and you’ll see the Hexo page.

最后，执行 hexo d 来将你的本地博客上传至GitHub Pages。

完成！现在访问 GitHub 域名 https://用户名.github.io，就可以看到Hexo界面啦！
